snippet.title: BRUTAL JOHN Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Play Demo and Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1859620/

BRUTAL JOHN is a fast-paced ultraviolent old school FPS that fuses together crazy storyline about mining technologies, with gameplay from cult classic shooters like Duke Nukem, Serious Sam, Doom, Soldier of Fortune.

#BrutalJohn #retro #trailer
